meanings.definition: Covered with tiny spots or specks
meanings.sent1: The old book had a flyspecked cover.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a flyspecked mural on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The flyspecked cat looked like it had been playing in paint.
meanings.sent4: The flyspecked sky resembled a canvas dotted with stars.
meanings.sent5: The flyspecked fabric had a unique charm to it.

meanings.definition: To cover or mark with tiny spots or specks
meanings.sent1: She flyspecked the paper with colorful dots.
meanings.sent2: The chef flyspecked the cake with powdered sugar.
meanings.sent3: He flyspecked the wall with paint, creating a whimsical design.
meanings.sent4: The artist flyspecked the canvas, adding depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The gardener flyspecked the garden with flower petals.
